alert.note: Alert for Clay; Cloud; Dickinson; Geary; Lyon; Morris; Ottawa; Republic (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 13 at 3:34AM CDT until October 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 020, 021, 034, 035, 036, 037, AND 054...FIRE WEATHER WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 020, 021, 034, 035, 036, 037, AND 054... * TIMING...From noon to 7 PM Thursday. From noon to 7 PM Friday. * WINDS...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph Thursday. West at 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph Friday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 16 percent Thursday. Between 19 and 22 percent Friday. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid to upper 60s Thursday and upper 70s Friday.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
